00019 SingletonUse<LogManager> ext_iterator::s_log;
00020 
00021 ext_iterator::file_ref ext_iterator::load(xml_attribute<> *attr) {
00022   file_ref ret;
00023   
00024   if( NULL!=attr ) {
00025     std::string name(attr->value(), attr->value_size());
00026     bool found;
00027     name = s_log->use(name, found);
00028     if( !found ) 
00029       ErrnoExcept("Unable to locate "+name);
00030     // load the file and notify LogManager that this file was used
00031     ret.reset(new file<>(name.c_str()));
00032     // TODO add the use of LogManager
00033   }
00034   return ret;
00035 }

00037 // structors :
00038 
00039 ext_iterator::ext_iterator(xml_node<> &node) 
00040   :m_external(false), m_current(node.first_node()),
00041    m_doc_root(NULL) {}
00042 
00043 ext_iterator::ext_iterator(xml_node<> const &node, std::string const &conf) 
00044   :m_external(false), m_current(node.first_node()), 
00045    m_file(load(node.first_attribute(conf.c_str()))),
00046    m_doc_root(NULL) {
00047   if( m_file ) {
00048     m_doc.reset(new xml_document<>);
00049     m_doc->parse<0>(m_file->data());
00050     m_doc_root = m_doc->first_node();
00051     if( NULL==m_doc_root )
00052       throw XmlError(node, std::string("Attribute ")+conf+" refers to an empty file.");
00053     if( NULL==m_current ) {
00054       m_external = true;
00055       m_current = m_doc_root->first_node();
00056     }
00057   }
00058 }

00060 // manipulators :
00061 
00062 ext_iterator ext_iterator::externalBegin(char *name) const {
00063   ext_iterator ret(*this);
00064   ret.m_external = true;
00065   if( ret.m_doc_root==NULL )
00066     ret.m_current = NULL;
00067   else
00068     ret.m_current = ret.m_doc_root->first_node(name);
00069   return ret;
00070 }
00071 
00072 ext_iterator::pointer ext_iterator::operator->() const {
00073   if( !valid() )
00074     throw Exception("Iterator referring to no node.");
00075   return m_current;
00076 }
00077 
00078 ext_iterator &ext_iterator::next(std::string const &name) {
00079   char const *name_c = NULL;
00080   if( !name.empty() )
00081     name_c = name.c_str();
00082 
00083   if( NULL!=m_current ) {
00084     m_current = m_current->next_sibling(name_c);
00085   } 
00086   if( NULL==m_current ) {
00087     if( !m_external && NULL!=m_doc_root ) {
00088       m_external = true;
00089       m_current = m_doc_root->first_node(name_c);
00090     }
00091   }
00092   return *this;
00093 }
00094 
00095 ext_iterator ext_iterator::find_tag(std::string const &name) const {
00096   if( NULL!=m_current && is_tag(*m_current, name) )
00097     return *this;
00098   else {
00099     ext_iterator tmp(*this);
00100     return tmp.next(name.c_str());
00101   }
00102 }
